title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/CPU support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node + browsers via fetch).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, uploads, RAG).

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Rich interactive terminal UI for Ollama (chat, model list, logs, prompts).

title: ollama-copilot (cmiller01/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support; chat, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-nestjs (vincenzodomina/ollama-nestjs)
summary: NestJS module wrapping ollama-js for dependency-injected LLM services.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators/embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-discord (daxton/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm (tbd/ollama-helm)
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-camunda (falko/ollama-camunda)
summary: Camunda 8 connector enabling BPMN service tasks to call Ollama models.

title: ollama-elixir (elixir-ollama/ollama-elixir)
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama with GenServer and streaming for Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-django (nigel-daniels/ollama-django)
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat & embeddings views/admin UI.

title: ollama-go (mxyng/ollama-go)
summary: Unofficial Go client for Ollama with generate, chat, embeddings and model ops.

title: ollama-docker-compose (gtaylor/ollama-docker-compose)
summary: Production-ready docker-compose stack with Ollama, GPU support, web UI, monitoring.
